features: [2023 Newest 8 Colors Coasters Set] Keep your table clean and enjoy your drink time with Craftizon 2023 upgraded 8 colors coasters for drinks absorbent. This coaster set includes 8pcs minimalist style round coasters in 8 colors and 1pcs black metal coaster holder, provide you with more color options than any other products in the market, great for table protection and home decoration.

[Premium Material & Superior Absorbent] These hand-woven drink coasters are made of 100% cotton and linen, durable, thicker and more absorbent than ceramic and silicone coasters. Any water splashed out of the cup can be absorbed in seconds. The metal coaster holder is made of ferrous metal, stain-proof, scratch-proof and rust-proof, suitable for long-term use.

[More Convenient to Clean & Store] This woven coaster is hand washable and dishwasher safe, super easy to clean, you can wash it under running water and hang to dry to keep it clean. When the coaster is not in use, you can put all coasters in the metal holder, and always ensure your tabletop is clean and tidy.

[Protect Your Tabletop] Reusable cotton coaster set features a soft surface and excellent thermal insulation performance, so you don’t have to worry about it scratching your tabletop like hard ceramic coasters. When you enjoy hot drinks, it will not leave any traces on your table. These heat-resistant coasters can effectively protect your furniture, coffee tabletops and countertops.

[Ideal Gift Choice] Crafted from natural materials and boasts a minimalist style, our coasters can be seamlessly integrated with any home decor style, perfect for kitchen, dining table, living room, bedroom, coffee bar and any other occasion. It’s great to send it as a special gift to your family and friends on birthdays, weddings, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, Mother’s Day, or as a thoughtful housewarming gift.
body.description: Craftizon 8 Colors Drink Coaster with Holder is a Good Choice for You! Multiple Colors and Minimalist Style Giving you more color choices, sleek and modern design matches most home décor styles and all kinds of cups. Protect Your Tabletop and Easy to Store Craftizon coasters are made of 100% cotton, which makes them highly absorbent, soft, and heat-resistant. They are designed to quickly absorb water spills and effectively protect your tabletop from scratches and burns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best coasters you can buy, happen to be pretty cheap too
reviews.reviewText: In some ways you might expect, and in other ways you might not, this style of coaster (cotton or other similar fabric in a wrapped/pressed disc) is the best type of coaster you can buy. Let's make a list:- They're absorbent. Condensation or spills get soaked up and dry naturally via evaporation.- They don't stick to your cup. Because the surface is naturally "rough" and never soaking wet, they don't stick to cups.- They're insulative. Maybe one you didn't think of. Consider what you wear when it's cold; Some thick clothes? This is that, for the bottom of your cup. It insulates it from the heat-sink that is your table, keeping your drink colder/hotter for longer regardless of the type of glass (not going to compete with/do anything for vacuum insulated bottles though).- They're soft. Drop them on something or on your toe, nothing is going to happen.- They're soft (again). They make as little noise as possible when someone rowdy plops a drink down on them with some gusto.- They're renewable. Made from cloth - pretty renewable and sustainable material.- They're cheap. No description required.- They're kinda trendy and kinda homey. Best of both worlds. Other styles are probably available elsewhere though.And maybe more. I was looking at some of those trendy "diatomaceous" stone-type products at first (the ones they say soak up and evaporate water quickly). Don't get me wrong, they look fun, but I'm so glad I didn't go with those. Honestly, every time I go to anyone else's house and they have coasters that aren't made of a similar cloth structure, I will be silently judging them. They could have had the best coasters ever for probably less than what they paid for the ones they have. Nothing was in their way, but they chose inferior coasters. How pitiful.Don't be pitiful. Be smart. Buy coasters like these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look nice, functional
reviews.reviewText: Thick and absorbent, the colors are nice and I like that they come with a holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and thick!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for condensation! thick and strong, liquid just kind of sits on top when drinks are sweating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these, so cute and they are super absorbent. Love love love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these! They are stylish, work very well and don't stick to your drink when you pick it up. They stay dry and come in an unobtrusive and simple holder. We liked them so much that I bought another set to put on the dining room table. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: They're inexpensive and they do the job. They're cute, but sizes are a tiny bit uneven, not one of them is exactly the same size as another, but not that big of a deal between the biggest one and smallest one there is probably only a quarter inch difference. How well they're held together and how smoothly the end tapers into the circle also differs, but hey, they're coasters and it almost gives them a home made feel. They work and we like them, but you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are really fantastic. Sturdy, good thickness, and hold even larger drinks. Love the neutral color scheme; it goes so well with the colors in my house! I also appreciated that the coasters came with a “rack” for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and cute.
reviews.reviewText: Soft, sturdy, absorbent, cute, good quality. I work order again.
